meanings.sent1: The professor praelects on the importance of history to the students.
meanings.sent2: She praelects on various scientific topics every Friday.
meanings.sent3: The cat praelects to the kittens about the art of catching mice.
meanings.sent4: His passion for literature praelects through his engaging storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The wise elder praelects wisdom to the younger generation.

meanings.definition: A lecture or discourse given as an introduction to a course of study
meanings.sent1: The praelects on biology sparked the students' interest in the subject.
meanings.sent2: Attending the praelects on art history was mandatory for all art majors.
meanings.sent3: The praelects on gardening made everyone laugh with its quirky jokes.
meanings.sent4: The praelects on astronomy opened up a whole new world of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The praelects on ancient civilizations brought history to life for the students.
